query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS brand VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'councilof.ai' CHECK (brand IN ('councilof.ai', 'safetyof.ai', 'both')),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS founding_member BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS referral_code VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE;
